AggOO::vs::base_parser

AggOO::vs::base_parser Class Reference

Base class used for the vector shape file parsers. This way, a wrapper can be implemented which will take care of calling the proper parser. More...

#include <aggoo_vs_base_parser.h>

Inheritance diagram for AggOO::vs::base_parser:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual bool parse (const char *fname)=0
char * title () const

Detailed Description

Base class used for the vector shape file parsers. This way, a wrapper can be implemented which will take care of calling the proper parser.

Member Function Documentation

Parse a vector shape file
